name: Active8 Intelligence
description: Founded in 2005, Activ8 Intelligence started as a tech-enabled HR consultancy, pioneering the use of employee data to solve HR problems. We work with organisations on large scale projects to increase employee engagement, reduce recruitment costs and increase retention by identifying things like ‘flight risks’ and ‘good hires’. Our people analytics platform, illumin8HR, evolved as we recognised the value of bringing employee data sources together to inform decisions and to understand their impact.
features: By bringing your people data together in one platform, illumin8HR can help your managers, HR and Finance teams make data driven decisions about the future workforce.
Gathering engagement data through surveys and pulse tests has become a rich source of intelligence to help identify potential problems and ultimately, ensure staff feel valued and supported.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: People Analytics made easy
ShortDescription: Activ8 have offices in Derby and London in the UK and have partnered with some of the largest HRIS and talent providers in the US and Europe, including Raet, SDWorx and Liaison.
enhanced_description: Active8 Intelligence, founded in 2005, originated as a tech-enabled HR consultancy, pioneering the use of employee data to solve complex HR problems. Their people analytics platform, illumin8HR, evolved to consolidate diverse employee data sources into a single platform, empowering data-driven decision-making for managers, HR, and Finance teams regarding the future workforce. The platform is designed to support large-scale HR projects, focusing on increasing employee engagement, reducing recruitment costs, and improving retention by identifying key insights such as 'flight risks' and 'good hires'. It specifically features capabilities for Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion initiatives and gathers engagement data through surveys and pulse tests to identify potential issues and ensure staff feel valued and supported.
